android.provider
接口 MediaStore.MediaColumns

所有超级接口：
BaseColumns
所有已知子接口：
MediaStore.Audio.AudioColumns, MediaStore.Images.ImageColumns, MediaStore.Video.VideoColumns
所有已知实现类：
MediaStore.Audio.Genres.Members, MediaStore.Audio.Media, MediaStore.Audio.Playlists.Members, MediaStore.Images.Media, MediaStore.Video.Media
包容类：
MediaStore
public static interface MediaStore.MediaColumns
extends BaseColumns

Common fields for most MediaProvider tables

字段摘要
static String DATA
          The data stream for the file Type: DATA STREAM
static String DATE_ADDED
          The time the file was added to the media provider Units are seconds since 1970.
static String DATE_MODIFIED
          The time the file was last modified Units are seconds since 1970.
static String DISPLAY_NAME
          The display name of the file Type: TEXT
static String MIME_TYPE
          The MIME type of the file Type: TEXT
static String SIZE
          The size of the file in bytes Type: INTEGER (long)
static String TITLE
          The title of the content Type: TEXT
 
从接口 android.provider.BaseColumns 继承的字段
_COUNT, _ID

另请参见：
常量字段值

DATE_MODIFIED

static final String DATE_MODIFIED
The time the file was last modified Units are seconds since 1970. NOTE: This is for internal use by the media scanner. Do not modify this field.

Type: INTEGER (long)

另请参见：
常量字段值

static final String MIME_TYPE
